author: bert
msg: Make table tag more flexible and replace table class style with ForresTable class for preparation of DTD docs styling.
Default html tags are not overrideable in CSS.

msg: maillog and ftp patches for the forrestbot thanks to mpo@outerthought.org

author: nicolaken
msg: Removed an unless attribute erroneously put in an echo task that was preventing the build with final version of Ant.
A revised version of the build system is in the works and will use and 1.5 final.
Thanks to Philipp Schmidt <Ph.Schmidt@gmx.de> for pointing this out.
